alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 12:25PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Millard County through 100 PM MDT... At 1225 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cove Fort, or 25 miles southwest of Fillmore, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Millard County. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 136 and 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties
